simplesect.para: This API will disable I2S, reset tx function Please ensure that there is a valid BCLK when calling this function
This API will disable I2S, reset rx function Please ensure that there is a valid BCLK when calling this function

briefdescription.para: I2S reset tx and rx function.

simplesect.para: This API will disable I2S, reset tx/rx function Please ensure that there is a valid BCLK when calling this function

briefdescription.para: I2S reset tx/rx and clock generator module.

simplesect.para: This API will disable I2S, reset tx/rx and clock generator module This function uses an internal clock to generate BCLK, then do reset operation, and finally restores the previous clock settings

briefdescription.para: I2S get data line tx fifo level.
I2S get data line rx fifo level.

parameterdescription.para: I2S STA.TX_UD or STA.RX_OV mask bits

simplesect.para: This API will disable I2S and configure parameters, could call i2s_enable() to enable I2S
This API will disable I2S and configure parameters, could call i2s_enable() to enable I2S

This API will disable I2S and configure parameters, could call i2s_enable() to enable I2S
This API will disable I2S and configure parameters, could call i2s_enable() to enable I2S
This API will disable I2S and configure parameters, could call i2s_enable() to enable I2S
This API will disable I2S and configure parameters, could call i2s_enable() to enable I2S

briefdescription.para: I2S get default transfer config for pdm.
I2S get default transfer config for dao.
I2S get default multiline transfer config.
I2S fill dummy data into TX fifo.

simplesect.para: workaround: fill dummy data into TX fifo to avoid TX underflow during tx start The first two data in FIFO will be pre read， which will cause the API to actually fill in 2 more dummy data than expected

parameterdescription.para: dummy data count, This value should be the same as the number of audio channels
